title: Diamond Floral Vaddanam Pendant - Contemporary Elegance for Your Special Occasions
features: Features a contemporary floral design meticulously crafted with pavé-set diamonds. The openwork design allows light to shine through, maximizing brilliance. The pendant's crescent shape makes it ideal for adorning a Vaddanam belt or layering with traditional Haaram necklaces. Modern interpretation of classic South Indian motifs.
description: This exquisite pendant is a modern heirloom, blending contemporary design with timeless elegance. Crafted with high-quality diamonds and polished to a radiant shine, it is a versatile piece that can be styled in countless ways. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster. Its unique design makes it a statement piece for both traditional and modern attire.
